posts.post_content:
Hello,

I'm looking for a nice, raw T3 Schmidt.  It won't be graded, so I don't need anything perfect.  Bright colors and a perfect registration are the most important features.  Please let me know what you have for sale.  In case you'd like to trade, I have a few raw T3s to barter with.

Please send scans and prices to me at [url]mackeyd@mailcity.com[/url]


Thanks,
Craig
